topic.title: HPE Helion 1.2 Development Platform: Management Console

body.p: The Management Console is a web interface for Application Lifecycle Service (ALS). Using the same API as the Helion CLI client, it provides access to a subset of features for deploying, scaling, and configuring applications as well as monitoring quota usage, and viewing logs.
The interface differs for Admin and non-Admin users. End-users should review the Console User Guide.. Administrators should reference the Console Admin Guide.
